decision.reasoning: Extreme Fear in market creates buying opportunities, but RSI BTC 62.2 and RSI ADA 59.4 sit in the 55-70 strengthening range, implying ongoing positive momentum but not a pullback-ready oversold setup. Prices are near upper Bollinger bands (BTC ~104,926 vs upper ~104,969; ADA ~0.576 vs upper ~0.58), signaling limited short-term downside buffer and potential resistance.
